summary.span: 对象的集合。

span.span: A collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含 控件中的 对象。The contains the objects in a control. 可以通过控件 属性检索此类的实例。You can retrieve an instance of this class through the control property. 集合通过 属性维护对控件的引用。The collection maintains a reference to the control through the property. 为了提高性能， 包括共享和非共享行。To improve performance, a includes shared and unshared rows. 共享行共享内存以降低大型记录集的成本。Shared rows share memory to reduce the cost of a large record set. 如果您的记录集非常大，则应该小心地尽量保持行共享。If your record set is very large, you should be careful to keep the rows shared as much as possible. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重载添加基于 的 的行。The overload adds rows that are based on the of the . 如果可能，将共享新行。The new row is shared, if possible. 请确保可以共享 属性中指定的行，以获得最佳的可伸缩性。Be sure that the row specified in the property can be shared for best scalability. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control). 添加新行时，不会自动对控件中的行进行排序。Rows in the control are not automatically sorted when new rows are added. 若要将新行排序到其正确位置，请在 事件处理程序中调用 方法。To sort new rows into their correct position, call the method in a event handler. 你可能还需要在 事件处理程序中调用 方法，以便在用户修改单元格时对行进行排序。You might also want to call the method in a event handler to sort the rows when the user modifies a cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法添加基于 的 的行。The method adds rows that are based on the of the . 如果可能，将共享新行。The new row is shared, if possible. 请确保可以共享 属性中指定的行，以获得最佳的可伸缩性。Be sure that the row specified in the property can be shared for best scalability. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control). 添加新行时，不会自动对控件中的行进行排序。Rows in the control are not automatically sorted when new rows are added. 若要将新行排序到其正确位置，请在 事件处理程序中调用 方法。To sort new rows into their correct position, call the method in a event handler. 你可能还需要在 事件处理程序中调用 方法，以便在用户修改单元格时对行进行排序。You might also want to call the method in a event handler to sort the rows when the user modifies a cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果可能， 方法会将共享行添加到 中。The method adds shared rows to the , if possible. 否则，新行将取消共享。Otherwise, the new rows are unshared. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control). 添加新行时，不会自动对控件中的行进行排序。Rows in the control are not automatically sorted when new rows are added. 若要将新行排序到其正确位置，请在 事件处理程序中调用 方法。To sort new rows into their correct position, call the method in a event handler. 你可能还需要在 事件处理程序中调用 方法，以便在用户修改单元格时对行进行排序。You might also want to call the method in a event handler to sort the rows when the user modifies a cell. > [!IMPORTANT] > 由于 bug，如果选择索引大于 `rowIndex` 的任何行， 方法会使应用程序停止响应。Due to a bug, the method will make your application stop responding if any rows with an index greater than `rowIndex` are selected. 若要解决此错误，必须先取消选择这些行，然后再调用此方法，并在以后重新选择这些行。To work around this bug, you must cancel the selection of these rows before calling this method, and reselect the rows afterward. 有关详细信息，请参阅本主题中的代码示例。For more information, see the code example in this topic. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法在选定行之前插入行，以解决 "备注" 部分中指示的 bug。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to insert rows before selected rows to work around the bug indicated in the Remarks section.
